definition: point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)

sentences.english: Don't leave the sharp knife where our little Jane can get it.
sentences.chinese: 不要把这把锋利的刀放在我们小简可能会够到的地方。

sentences.english: Dragonsnakes were well armored with razor fins, and had rows of sharp fangs in their mouths.
sentences.chinese: 龙蛇有着锋利的鳍，嘴里长着尖利的毒牙。

sentences.english: Menisci can be easily torn with sharp, rapid motions.
sentences.chinese: 半月板撕裂，可以很容易用锋利的快速运动。

sentences.english: Then they cut him in two with a sharp sword, and left both halves of his body in the middle of the road.
sentences.chinese: 强盗们用一把锋利的剑把牧师砍成两截留在了路中央。

sentences.english: eg: I cut the cake with a sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 我用一把锋利的刀切蛋糕。

sentences.english: When Larkshimi tried to killed the chital, she has to avoid the sharp buckhorn which will be very dangerous to the tiger.
sentences.chinese: 当老虎试图咬死白斑鹿的时候，就要避开锋利的鹿角。

sentences.english: Leopards have the sharp claw, uses for to prey on.
sentences.chinese: 金钱豹有锋利的爪子，用来捕食。

sentences.english: Well, I guess I just didn't realize just how sharp this exacto knife was.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我承认我没有想到这个小刀能有这么锋利。

sentences.english: I've also learned to control my pressure using a sharper edge scribing tool .
sentences.chinese: 我也学会了控制我的压力，用锋利的边缘切割工具。

sentences.english: The guard's mouth is like a knife.
So I grabbed what looked like the sharpest knife and went to the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 于是我抄起看上去最锋利的一把刀，走向了浴室。

sentences.english: The sheep was butchered by a man with a sharp knife .
sentences.chinese: 那只羊被一个人用锋利的刀宰杀了。

sentences.english: Medium carbon steel fails to tell me if it will get sharp.
sentences.chinese: 中碳钢失败告诉我如果它将得到锋利。

sentences.english: And the sides of the beak have razor-sharp edges, to tear flesh away from the carcass.
sentences.chinese: 尖喙的两侧像刀片一样锋利，可以撕裂肉块。

sentences.english: Each book carving was made using sharp knives , tweezers, and scissors .
sentences.chinese: 每一本书雕都是借助锋利的刀片，镊子和剪刀完成的。

definition: cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool
